thread.section_title: Groves Nurseries Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groves Nurseries | www.grovesnurseries.co.uk
thread.title: Natalie

author: Natalie
title: Natalie
text: My grape vines arrived in just 2 days, very well packaged and insulated with straw. The plants look well-developed, strong and healthy. I ordered grape vines from another online supplier at the same time and could compare the quality of plants and the service first-hand. Yours were so much better, and unbelievably also less expensive for the size and quality of plants. Thank you very much for excellent plants and prompt delivery.
